page.title: 15SPORT FOR ALL IN NEWHAVEN
page.content:
There are two recreation grounds: these have playing facilities such as swings and slides. At one of the recreation grounds there is a bowling green, a cricket pitch, a football pitch, a hockey pitch and tennis courts. Newhaven has its own swimming pool which was opened in 1984. There are no diving facilities there. At Fort Newhaven there is a play area for twelves and unders, amusements and crazy golf. At the Boys Club there are numerous facilities for teenagers, such as darts, pool, table tennis, clubs including karate and indoor football.
Many local people fish off the two piers. Once a year TVS sponsor a fishing competition in Newhaven.
